name.ui:title: Name
name.ui:help: (the name of this object, must be unique within a namespace)

namespace.ui:title: Namespace
namespace.ui:help: (defines the namespace in within this object must be unique, empty = default)

labels.ui:title: Labels
labels.ui:description: Key/value pairs that can be used for organization and categorization

annotations.ui:title: Annotations
annotations.ui:description: Arbitrary metadata set/used by external tools

clusterName.ui:title: Cluster Name
clusterName.ui:help: (optional name of the cluster which the object belongs to)

generateName.ui:title: Generate Name
generateName.ui:help: (an optional prefix used by the server to generate a unique name ONLY IF the Name field has not been provided)

finalizers.ui:title: Finalizers
finalizers.ui:description: Must be empty before the object is deleted from the registry
